cause.description:
We here at Misappropriation of charitable contributions, INC. believe that the managers of charitable funds should receive 70 cents on the dollar in payment from the funds received by their organizations. Charity does not work if the people running the volunteer networks and collection agencies cannot support themselves in a manner befitting the warmhearted humanitarians they are.
1. Clubbing baby seals
2. Nuclear weapons for all
3. Encouragiing Syrian children to play in traffic
cause.name: Misappropriation of charitable contributions, INC.
